pre_caption:
This is a scenery shot of a street corner, with the camera appearing stationary or moving very slowly.

The scene is captured at dusk or on an overcast day. A red SUV is parked on the right side of the frame, next to a crosswalk and a traffic pole. In the background, trees line the street, including one with vibrant pink blossoms. Streetlights are illuminated.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
